name: Card X Monster
description:
Card X Monster is an adventure RPG mixed with cards and monsters! Play through the eyes of a young Explorer looking for the legendary Moon Card and pass the Explorer Exam, an adventure and that will see them explore new lands and their hidden secrets.

  • Real time action! Support your Monster in battle with cards and rare items vs other explorers and untamed monsters.
  • Invite your friends! Feel free to play solo or play up to 4 friends together as you travel and collect new cards
  • Open world! Explore an open world full of interesting characters and sights. On foot, riding on a monster or on water.
  • Synergy! The most important thing is the relationship between you and your monster. Build chemistry with your Monster via their favorite foods and hobbies
  • solves puzzles where you need to work alongside monsters to solve puzzles and find new treasure

Join the Discord! We're growing fast and would love to talk about the game. Also will be giving out prelaunch bonuses.
